nars.util.signal

Enum OneDHaar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<OneDHaar>
      • nars.util.signal.OneDHaar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<OneDHaar>

    public enum OneDHaar
extends java.lang.Enum<OneDHaar>
    ============================================================================
    Author:
    Vladimir Kulyukin An implementation of 1D Ordered Fast Haar Wavelet Transform, Ordered Fast Inverse Haar Wavelet Transform, Inplace Fast Haar Wavelet Transform, and Inplace Fast Inverse Haar Wavelet Transform as specified in Ch. 01 of "Wavelets Made Easy" by Yves Nievergelt & "Ripples in Mathematics" by A. Jensen, A. La Cour-Harbo. Bugs to vladimir dot kulyukin at gmail dot com ============================================================================ https://github.com/cscheiblich/JWave/
